{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = Governor Mourel / False Programmer | class = Peasant22 | game = Strife | doomednum = 181 | convid = 27 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Peasant|Peasant]]→Peasant22

A peasant who wears a blue-colored tunic. He is Governor Mourel on MAP02 and MAP33, and is a False Programmer on MAP08. {| border="0" |- !width=7%|Map!!width=14%|Name!!width=76%|Notes |- | MAP02/33 || {{dw|Governor Mourel}} || It is important to finish his quest before attempting {{Class|Peasant4|Harris}}' job offer. |- | MAP08 || {{dw|False Programmer}} || One of three false [[Classes:Programmer|Programmers]]. |} ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Peasant22 : {{Class|Peasant}} { {{Property|Translation}} 6 }
